q_en: What cutting tasks will be completed before April 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE ct.end_time < '2024-04-30' AND ct.status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks that will be completed before April 30, 2024
